attributes.action: Introduce legislation requiring all computer altered images to be labeled as a CGI
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
With the expansion of multi media and the photographic publications. Many publications now carry images, that have been altered by computer, so many of the images that we observe are not a true picture of an event or person. 
I would propose any future publication would carry a label stating that the image had been altered.
